subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Richard Johnson won the season-ending Nationwide Tour Championship to lead the 25 qualifiers for the 2008 PGA Tour, shooting a four-under 67 for a one-stroke victory over Michael Letzig in Lakeside, Calif.
snippet: Richard Johnson won the season-ending Nationwide Tour Championship to lead the 25 qualifiers for the 2008 PGA Tour, shooting a four-under 67 for a one-stroke victory over Michael Letzig in Lakeside, Calif.
